text:
Indian cinema is definitely going through a transitional phase. Brilliant actors are finally getting their due recognition. One of them is Pankaj Tripathi, the man who is on a roll after Gangs of Wasseypur. After web shows like Sacred Games and Mirzapur and films like Stree, Newton, Gurgaon, Bareilly Ki Barfi. he will also be seen in Kapil Dev’s biopic 83, alongside Ranveer Singh.
Twitter
But wait, that’s not all. The man is unstoppable. One of the finest actors in Bollywood today, Pankaj Tripathi has bagged his first Hollywood project too. Guess which Hollywood biggie is starring in it? Chris Hemsworth AKA Thor!
Which film is this? Well, it’s Chris Hemsworth’s first Netflix movie titled Dhaka. If you remember Chris was in India last November to shoot the movie. Randeep Hooda, Manoj Bajpayee, David Harbour and Golshifteh Farahani are among other actors who are a part of the movie. It is said that Pankaj Tripathi will join the cast in Bangkok, Thailand.
As per reports, Pankaj Tripathi is playing a pivotal role in the movie. He will also be sharing screen space with Chris Hemsworth. Well, we are already excited, what about you?
Dhaka is a thriller movie and, it will be released as Netflix Originals.
Also Read: Chris Hemsworth AKA Thor Secretly Flew Down To India To Shoot With Manoj Bajpayee & Randeep Hooda For A Movie

title: Pankaj Tripathi Scales New Heights, Bags His First Hollywood Film With Chris Hemsworth AKA Thor
